SEARCH
Package com.example.queueup.models

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.queueup.models.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Event extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an event with comprehensive details including its schedule, location, organizer, and participant information. This class manages event attendance, announcements, and facilitates event check-ins via QR codes.
See Also:
